required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of SP-02L in Relapsed or Refractory Patients With Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL) in Korea
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study of SP-02L (Darinaparsin for Injection) in Relapsed or Refractory Patients With Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL) in Korea

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SP-02L monotherapy in Korean patients with relapsed or refractory Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL).

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of dose-limiting toxicity and adverse events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 hours post-dose on Day 1 and 5, and 0 hour on Day 2, 3, 4, 6, 8 and 15
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax, Area under curve, Tmax, t1/2, Clearance and Volume of distribution

intervention.description: Cohort 1: Darinaparsin 300 mg/m2 for 5 consecutive days every 28 days (5 days therapy, 23 days no therapy is one cycle). Subjects may start from Cycle 1 and continue to a maximum of 4 cycles of treatment.

Cohort 2: Darinaparsin 300 mg/m2 for 5 consecutive days every 21 days (5 days therapy, 16 days no therapy is one cycle). Subjects may start from Cycle 1 and continue to a maximum of 4 cycles of treatment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Korean patients aged â‰¥ 20 years of age at the day of obtaining the informed consent
- Patients with histologically confirmed diagnosis of the following:
- PTCL, not otherwise specified (PTCL-NOS)
- Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma (ALCL ALK-positive/negative)
- Angioimmunoblastic T-cell Lymphoma (AITL)
- Have relapsed or refractory to at least one prior systemic chemotherapy for the above disease (currently requiring therapy)
- Have at least 1 evaluable lesion
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 to 2
- Life expectancy of at least 3 months
